sentence: What is even worse is that this is a classroom in Brian Kemp's Georgia, not New York or California.
author: Matthew Boyle
title: Exclusive David Perdue Slams Stacey Abrams and Brian Kemp in Unmask Our Kids' Ad

title: Stacey Abrams, Brian Kemp and David Perdue each disclose net worth in millions
